page.title: 08Congleton Leisure Centre
page.content: {Congleton's Leisure Centre}is the main indoor recreation area in Congleton. It was built between 1974 and 1976. There are two swimming pools, competitive and childrens sizes. The rest of the centre includes the large main hall and a smaller practice hall, a sauna, a solarium and three squash courts. There is a rifle range which is owned by the Territorial Army. The centre provides a bar and a refreshment area where you can buy drinks or snacks after your exhausting sports activity. There is a range of sports for every age group including badminton, popmobility, roller skating and weight training. Also there is outdoor activities such as rugby and football.
